# dataproductportal_output_port (Data Source)

Fetches an output port from the Data Product Portal.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dataproductportal_output_port" "example" {
  id              = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"
  data_product_id = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002"
}
```

- `id` (String) The unique identifier.
